sql: SELECT MIN(n.name) AS of_person, MIN(t.title) AS biography_movie FROM aka_name AS an, cast_info AS ci, info_type AS it, link_type AS lt, movie_link AS ml, name AS n, person_info AS pi, title AS t WHERE an.name LIKE '%a%' AND it.info ='mini biography' AND lt.link ='features' AND n.name_pcode_cf LIKE 'D%' AND n.gender = 'm' AND pi.note ='Volker Boehm' AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1984 AND n.id = an.person_id AND n.id = pi.person_id AND ci.person_id = n.id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ml.linked_movie_id = t.id AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id AND it.id = pi.info_type_id AND pi.person_id = an.person_id AND pi.person_id = ci.person_id AND an.person_id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = ml.linked_movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(n an t pi ci it ml lt)
 HashJoin(n an t pi ci it ml)
 MergeJoin(n an t pi ci it)
 HashJoin(an t pi ci it)
 MergeJoin(t pi ci it)
 HashJoin(t pi ci)
 MergeJoin(pi ci)
 IndexScan(n)
 SeqScan(an)
 BitmapScan(t)
 IndexScan(pi)
 TidScan(ci)
 BitmapScan(it)
 BitmapScan(ml)
 BitmapScan(lt)
 Leading((((n (an ((t (pi ci)) it))) ml) lt)) */
